0.Text: Hover gains {1} additional charge.
Casting Emerald Blossom or Verdant Embrace reduces the cast time of your next Living Flame by {1}%.
Casting an empower spell extends the duration of Dragonrage by {1} sec.
Disintegrate deals {1}% more damage.
Shattering Star generates {1} Essence.
Your healing done and healing received are increased by {1}%.
Azure Strike has a {1}% chance to cause an Essence Burst, making your next Disintegrate or Pyre cost no Essence.
Project intense energy onto {1} enemies, dealing {2} Spellfrost damage to them.
Fire Breath's damage over time lasts {1} sec longer.
Weave the threads of time, reducing the cooldown of a major movement ability for all party and raid members by {1}% for {2} min.
Emerald Blossom heals {1} additional allies.
Fire Breath damage has {1}% chance to cause your next Living Flame to be instant cast, stacking {2} times.
Verdant Embrace increases the healing of your next Dream Breath by {1}%, or your next Living Flame by {2}%.
While channeling Disintegrate your Fire Breath on the target deals damage {1}% more often.
Essence abilities reduce the remaining cooldown of Eternity Surge by {1} sec.
Cauterize an ally's wounds, removing all Bleed, Poison, Curse, and Disease effects. Heals for {1} upon removing any effect.
Your Blue damage increases the damage of your next Pyre by {1}%, stacking {2} times.
Activate to automatically assume your Visage when you leave combat or after Soaring.

1.Text:
While active, you automatically assume your Visage when you leave combat or after Soaring.

Activate to disable this effect.

0.Text: Trap the enemy in a time loop for {1} sec. Afterwards, they are returned to their previous location and health. Cannot reduce an enemy's health below {2}%.
Tail Swipe's cooldown is reduced by {1} sec.
Disintegrate amplifies Permeating Chill to reduce movement speed by an additional {1}% each time it deals damage, up to {2}%.
Every {1} Emerald Blossoms leaves behind a tiny sprout which gathers {2}% of your healing over {3} sec. The sprout then heals allies within {4} yds, divided evenly among targets.

Take in a deep breath and fly to the targeted location, spewing molten cinders dealing {1} Volcanic damage to enemies in your path.

Removes all root effects. You are immune to movement impairing and loss of control effects while flying.
Time Dilation delays {1}% of damage taken.
Pyre's Essence cost is reduced by {1}.
Tear into an enemy with a blast of blue magic, inflicting {1} Spellfrost damage over {2} sec, and slowing their movement speed by {3}% for {4} sec.
Your Stamina is increased by {1}%.

Erupt with draconic fury and exhale Pyres at {1} enemies within {2} yds.

For {3} sec, Essence Burst's chance to occur is increased to {4}%, and you gain the maximum benefit of Mastery: Giantkiller regardless of targets' health.

Inhale, gathering the power of the Dream. Release to exhale, healing {1} injured allies in a {2} yd cone in front of you for {3}.

{FFFFFFFF|I:}   Heals {4} instantly and {5} over {6} sec.

{FFFFFFFF|II:}  Heals {7} instantly and {8} over {9} sec.

{FFFFFFFF|III:} Heals {10} instantly and {11} over {12} sec.

Take in a deep breath and fly to the targeted location, healing all allies in your path for {1} immediately, and {2} over {3} sec.

Removes all root effects. You are immune to movement impairing and loss of control effects while flying.
Summon a flying projection of yourself that heals allies you pass through for {1}. Detonating your projection dispels all nearby allies of Magical effects, and heals for {2} over {3} sec.
You are able to move while communing with the Dream.
Wrap an ally with temporal energy, healing them for {1} and causing your next non-Echo healing spell to cast an additional time on that ally at {2}% of normal healing.
Grow a bulb from the Emerald Dream at an ally's location. After {1} sec, heal up to {2} injured allies within {3} yds for {4}.

Commune with the Emerald Dream, restoring {1}% health and {2}% mana every {3} sec for {4} sec. Overhealing is transferred to an injured ally within {5} yds.

Castable while stunned, disoriented, incapacitated, or silenced.
Spiritbloom increases your Essence regeneration rate by {1}% for {2} sec.
Living Flame restores {1}% of its mana cost when striking an enemy.
Disintegrate deals {1}% more damage and generates {2} mana over its duration.
Living Flame deals {1}% increased damage and healing, but its cast time is increased by {2} sec.
Living Flame deals {1}% more damage and healing.
Rewind has {1} charges, but its healing is reduced by {2}%.
Essence Burst stacks {1} times.
Your Living Flame has a {1}% chance, and your Azure Strike has a {2}% chance, to make your next Disintegrate or Pyre cost no Essence. Stacks {3} times.

1.Text: Living Flame has a {1}% chance to make your next Essence ability free. Stacks {2} times.

0.Text:
Focus your energies to release a salvo of pure magic, dealing {1} Spellfrost damage to an enemy. Damages additional enemies within {2} yds of the target when empowered.

{FFFFFFFF|I:}   Damages {3} enemy.

{FFFFFFFF|II:}  Damages {4} enemies.

{FFFFFFFF|III:} Damages {5} enemies.

1.Text:
Focus your energies to release a salvo of pure magic, dealing {1} Spellfrost damage to an enemy. Damages additional enemies within {2} yds of the target when empowered.

{FFFFFFFF|III:} Damages {5} enemies.

{FFFFFFFF|IV:} Damages {6} enemies.

0.Text: Eternity Surge and Shattering Star hit twice as many targets.
Red spells extend the duration of your Fire Breath's damage over time by {1} sec.
Each time you gain Essence Burst, your critical healing is increased by {1}% for {2} sec.
Expunge toxins affecting an ally, removing all Poison effects.
Hover lasts {1} sec longer.
While above {1}% health, your movement speed is increased by {2}%.
Eternity Surge critical strikes generate {1} Essence.
Consuming Essence Burst reduces the remaining cooldown of Fire Breath by {1} sec.
Gain a {1}% chance for one of your Fluttering Seedlings to grow into a new Emerald Blossom.

Inhale, stoking your inner flame. Release to exhale, burning enemies in a cone in front of you for {1} Fire damage, reduced beyond {2} targets.

Empowering causes more of the damage to be dealt immediately instead of over time.

{FFFFFFFF|I:}   Deals {3} damage instantly and {4} over {5} sec.

{FFFFFFFF|II:}  Deals {6} damage instantly and {7} over {8} sec.

{FFFFFFFF|III:} Deals {9} damage instantly and {10} over {11} sec.

1.Text:
Inhale, stoking your inner flame. Release to exhale, burning enemies in a cone in front of you for {1} Fire damage, reduced beyond {2} targets.

Empowering causes more of the damage to be dealt immediately instead of over time.

{FFFFFFFF|I:}   Deals {3} damage instantly and {4} over {5} sec.

{FFFFFFFF|II:}  Deals {6} damage instantly and {7} over {8} sec.

0.Text: Renewing Blaze's cooldown is reduced by {1} sec.
An explosion bombards the target area with white-hot embers, dealing {1} Fire damage to enemies over {2} sec.
Empower spells cause time to flow {1}% faster for you, increasing movement speed, cooldown recharge rate, and cast speed. Lasts {2} sec.
Emerald Blossom sends out {1} flying seedlings when it bursts, healing allies up to {2} yds away for {3}.
Renewing Blaze restores you more quickly, causing damage you take to be healed back over {1} sec.
Shattering Star's damage taken effect lasts {1} sec longer.
Your empower spells' maximum level is increased by {1}.
Landslide's cooldown is reduced by {1} sec, and it can withstand {2}% more damage before breaking.

Increases haste by {1}% for all party and raid members for {2} sec.

Allies receiving this effect will become Exhausted and unable to benefit from Fury of the Aspects or similar effects again for {3} min.
Reversion instantly heals the target for {1}% of damage taken in the last {2} sec.
Your healing is increased by {1}% on targets with your Reversion.
Fire Breath deals {1}% more damage.
Wing Buffet's cooldown is reduced by {1} sec.
Essence Burst has a {1}% chance to not be consumed.
Azure Strike and Living Flame deal {1}% more damage.

Launch yourself and gain {1}% increased movement speed for {2} sec.

Allows Evoker spells to be cast while moving. Does not affect empowered spells.
Empower spells reach maximum level in {1}% less time.
Quell's cooldown is reduced by {1} sec.
Emerald Blossom costs {1} Essence, but no longer has a cooldown.
Magic damage taken reduced by {1}%.
Essence regenerates {1}% faster.
Your Living Flame and Emerald Blossom are {1}% more effective on yourself.
Your Magic damage done is increased by {1}%.
Casting an empower spell increases the damage of your next {1} spells of the same color by {2}% within {3} sec.
Time Dilation's cooldown is reduced by {1} sec each time you cast an Essence ability.
Conjure a path of shifting stone towards the target location, rooting enemies for {1} sec. Damage may cancel the effect.
Deep Breath's damage is increased by {1}%.
Fire Breath causes your next Living Flame to strike {1} additional target per empower level.
Fire Breath heals a nearby injured ally for {1}% of damage done to up to {2} targets.
Verdant Embrace temporarily bonds your life with an ally, causing your healing on either partner to heal the other for {1}% of the amount. Lasts {2} sec.
Living Flame and Fire Breath deal additional damage and healing equal to {1}% of your maximum health.
Send a flickering flame towards your target, healing an ally for {1} or dealing {2} Fire damage to an enemy.

1.Text: Send a flickering flame towards your target, dealing {1} Fire damage to an enemy or healing an ally for {2}.

0.Text: Green spells restore {1}% more health.
Brings all dead party members back to life with {1}% health and mana. Cannot be cast when in combat.
Increases the damage of your spells by up to {1}%, based on the current health of your target. Higher health targets take more damage.
Healing done to allies is increased by {1}% while their health percentage is lower than your own.
Disintegrate channels {1}% faster.
Cleanses harmful effects from the target, removing all Magic and Poison effects.
Temporal Anomaly reduces the cooldowns of your empower spells by {1} sec.
Wreathe yourself in arcane energy, preventing the next {1} full loss of control effects against you. Lasts {2} sec.
Obsidian Scales has an additional charge.
While Obsidian Scales is active you gain immunity to interrupt, silence, and pushback effects.
Reinforce your scales, reducing damage taken by {1}%. Lasts {2} sec.
Deep Breath's cooldown is reduced by {1} min.
Let out a bone-shaking roar at enemies in a cone in front of you, increasing the duration of crowd controls that affect them by {1}% in the next {2} sec.
Casting Echo grants one stack of Ouroboros, increasing the healing of your next Emerald Blossom by {1}%, stacking up to {2} times.
Oppressing Roar removes {1} Enrage effect from each enemy, and its cooldown is reduced by {2} sec for each Enrage dispelled.
Emerald Blossom instantly heals you for {1} when cast.
Disintegrate reduces the target's movement speed by {1}% for {2} sec.

1.Text: Your damaging Blue spells reduce the target's movement speed by {1}% for {2} sec.

0.Text: Increases your maximum Essence to {1}.
Casting an empower spell increases your Essence regeneration rate by {1}% for {2} sec.
If an interrupt is used on you while you are not casting, gain {1}% Haste and become immune to crowd control, interrupt, and cast pushback effects for {2} sec.
Azure Strike damages {1} additional enemy.
Reversion has {1} charges.
Lob a ball of flame, dealing {1} Fire damage to the target and nearby enemies.
Interrupt an enemy's spellcasting and prevent any spell from that school of magic from being cast for {1} sec.
You may reactivate Dream Flight and Deep Breath within {1} sec after landing to travel back in time to your takeoff location.

1.Text: You may reactivate Deep Breath within {1} sec after landing to travel back in time to your takeoff location.

0.Text: Source of Magic forms a bond with your ally, causing {1}% of their healing to also heal you while you are below {2}% health.
The flames of life surround you for {1} sec. While this effect is active, {2}% of damage you take is healed back over {3} sec.
Dream Breath healing is increased by {1}%.
Swoop to an ally and fly with them to the target location.
Temporal Anomaly applies Echo at {1}% effectiveness to the first {2} allies it passes through.
Brings a dead party member back to life with {1}% health and mana. Cannot be cast when in combat.
Repair an ally's injuries, healing them for {1} over {2} sec. When Reversion critically heals, its duration is extended by {3} sec.

Rewind {1}% of damage taken in the last {2} seconds by all allies within {3} yds. Always heals for at least {4}.

Healing increased by {5}% when not in a raid.
Living Flame deals {1} damage over {2} sec to enemies, or restores {3} health to allies over {4} sec. Stacks {5} times.
Your Living Flame has a {1}% chance to cause an Essence Burst, making your next Disintegrate or Pyre cost no Essence.
Emerald Communion increases your maximum health by {1}% for {2} sec.
Store {1}% of your effective healing, up to {2}. Your next damaging Living Flame consumes all stored healing to increase its damage dealt.
Disintegrate has a {1}% chance each time it deals damage to launch a level {2} Eternity Surge at {3}% power.
Fire Breath burns away {1} beneficial Magic effect per empower level from all targets.
Exhale a bolt of concentrated power from your mouth for {1} Spellfrost damage that cracks the target's defenses, increasing the damage they take from you by {2}% for {3} sec.
Disorient an enemy for {1} sec, causing them to sleep walk towards you. Damage has a chance to awaken them.
Living Flame has a {1}% chance to reset the cooldown of Firestorm, and make your next one instant cast and deal {2}% increased damage.
Redirect your excess magic to a friendly healer for {1} min. When you cast an empowered spell, you restore {2}% of their maximum mana per empower level. Limit {3}.
Consuming a full Temporal Compression grants you Essence Burst.
Your damaging critical strikes deal {1}% damage instead of the usual {2}%.

Divert spiritual energy, healing an ally for {1}. Splits to injured allies within {2} yds when empowered.

{FFFFFFFF|I:}   Heals one ally.

{FFFFFFFF|II:}  Heals a second ally.

{FFFFFFFF|III:} Heals a third ally.
Spiritbloom's cooldown is reduced by {1} sec.
Causes your next {1} helpful spells to be duplicated and stored in a time lock. You may reactivate Stasis any time within {2} sec to quickly unleash their magic.
Grab an enemy and fly with them to the target location.
Lash out with your tail, knocking enemies within {1} yds into the air.
Hover increases your movement speed by {1}% for the first {2} sec.
Your dragon scales increase your armor by {1}%.
Send forward a vortex of temporal energy, absorbing {1} damage on you and any allies in its path. Absorption is reduced beyond {2} targets.
Rewind's cooldown is reduced by {1} sec.
Each cast of a Bronze spell causes your next empower spell to reach maximum level in {1}% less time, stacking up to {2} times.
Deep Breath stuns enemies for {1} sec.
Stretch time around an ally for the next {1} sec, causing {2}% of damage they would take to instead be dealt over {3} sec.
Echo replicates {1}% more healing.

When you or an ally fall below {1}% health, a version of yourself enters your timeline and heals them for {2}. Your alternate self continues healing for {3} sec before returning to their timeline.

May only occur once every {4} sec.
Bend time, allowing you and your allies within {1} yds to cast their major movement ability once in the next {2} sec, even if it is on cooldown.

Freeze an ally's timestream for {1} sec. While frozen in time they are invulnerable, cannot act, and auras do not progress.

You may reactivate Time Stop to end this effect early.
Reversion, Time Dilation, and Echo last {1}% longer.
Compress time to make your next empowered spell cast instantly at its maximum empower level.
Essence Burst increases the damage of affected spells by {1}%.
Rescue protects you and your ally from harm, absorbing damage equal to {1}% of your maximum health for {2} sec.
During Deep Breath and Dragonrage you gain the maximum benefit of Mastery: Giantkiller regardless of targets' health.
Hover makes you immune to movement speed reduction effects.
Sunder an enemy's protective magic, dealing {1} Spellfrost damage to absorb shields.
Fly to an ally and heal them for {1}, or heal yourself for the same amount.

Switch between your Dracthyr and Visage forms.

Your Visage emanates magic, significantly increasing out-of-combat health regeneration for your party.
Pyre has a {1}% chance to flare up and explode again on a nearby target.
Wing Buffet and Tail Swipe knock enemies further and daze them, reducing movement speed by {1}% for {2} sec.
With a powerful flap of your wings, knock away enemies in front of you.
Conjure an updraft to lift you and your {1} nearest allies within {2} yds into the air, reducing damage taken from area-of-effect attacks by {3}% and increasing movement speed by {4}% for {5} sec.
